title: First Typophile Critique Thursday! - August 18, 2005
content:
Hello everyone!

Welcome to the first Typophile **Critique Thursday**!

Between the hours of 1pm – 3pm E.S.T., I'd like to invite all typophile to critique the following typefaces on our critique forums. Here are direct links:

**Bitmap Display/Script**  
 [Trixie](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051916/http:/typophile.com/node/7694)

**Bitmap Text**  
 [Minque](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051916/http:/typophile.com/node/8034)

**Blackletter/Uncial**  
 [Adam](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051916/http:/typophile.com/node/5416)

**Display**  
 [Sëftos Parathenia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051916/http:/typophile.com/node/14471)

**Display**  
 [Sëftos Parathenia](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051916/http:/typophile.com/node/14471)

**Motion/3d/Experimental**  
 [KUB](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051916/http:/typophile.com/node/5331)

**Sans**  
 [Parker Sans (Still Untitled…)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051916/http:/typophile.com/node/14419)

**Script/Handwriting/Graffiti**  
 [AS Letters](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051916/http:/typophile.com/node/9315)

**Serif**  
 [Notanutha Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051916/http:/typophile.com/node/10479)

My moderator access does not allow me to change the names of older threads. So while I didn't change the names of all the threads to read something like **Critique Thursday: Featured Serif Design** , I think that everything will be OK anyway.

My appologies to designers who sent me suggestions that I did not use. It certainly does not mean that I don't like your work! I tried, wherever possible, to avoid typefaces that already had a lot of discussion (like Raph's, for instance).

So, let's get on to the critique, and see what discussion comes out…

For discussion on the idea "Critique Thursday" itself, please visit this thread: [http://typophile.com/node/14608](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051916/http:/typophile.com/node/14608 "http://typophile.com/node/14608")
author: dan_reynolds
